productName: Tefal Ingenio Easy On Set of 3 pans + removable handle 3 pans 22/24/26 cm, removable handle, non-stick pans, coating
productFeatures: Stackable pans with a removable and interchangeable handle, easy to use and space-saving.
Titanium non-stick coating and scratch-resistant, durable and lasts up to 6 times longer.
Thermo-Signal technology for optimal and even cooking results.
productAvailabillity: In stock. Estimated delivery in 3 to 4 working days.

description.descriptionTextMain: Compatible with the following types of hobs: gas, electric, ceramic, and halogen. Not suitable for induction. Designed and made in France. Easy to clean thanks to the high-performance non-stick coating inside and outside for excellent functionality.

tableRows.rowText: Tefal Ingenio Easy On Set of 3 pans + removable handle 3 pans 22/24/26 cm, removable handle, non-stick pans, coating

blogs.header: Ultra-portable JBL Pro sound with more powerful bass
blogs.text: Don't be fooled by the small size. The JBL Go 4 delivers impressive JBL Pro sound with powerful bass. Your friends won't believe how much JBL Pro sound comes from such a small speaker.

blogs.header: Up to 7 hours of battery life plus 2 hours with Playtime Boost
blogs.text: Don't worry about minor details like charging your battery. The JBL Go 4 offers up to 7 hours of battery life on a single charge. Simply press Playtime Boost to extend the battery life, adding up to 2 extra hours. It adjusts and optimises performance for louder and clearer sound.
The JBL Go 4, with its IP67 waterproof and dust-resistant rating, ensures that this portable speaker can handle almost any environment, from a pool party to a seaside picnic.

comments.name: Ghislaine d'Oliveira da Silva Bago
comments.text: I had them delivered to my daughter's house who said it was a lovely gift. Delivery took place on the indicated day.

comments.text: Nice set of Tefal pans. The well-known quality of the brand.

comments.header: Wow, incredible sound! In a small portable speaker

comments.text: For the kitchen, it's perfect! They go from vitro to oven. Perfect!

comments.header: Incredible small speaker - Perfect in so many ways
comments.name: D.Bartoli
comments.text: Pans we know, but over time with use, they needed to be replaced, so I bought the same ones again. Thanks for the quick shipping.
